item.title: Conflict with God wars Interface and nonwild interface Need help
item.dc:creator: @chassy13 Chassy13
item.description:
@chassy13 wrote:

Did you disable the safe interface? Only one interface can be loaded at a time I believe. Tbh, I would remove the whole safe/wild skull, it’s worthless.

Read full topic

item.title: Conflict with God wars Interface and nonwild interface Need help
item.dc:creator: @Jeremy368 Jeremy368
item.description:
@Jeremy368 wrote:

I am having a problem with the Interface that shows the kills

That is what i want it to look like
and this is the code i used

[code]if (godwars()) {
sendQuest("@whi@Godwars", 15894); //Title

          //Left hand side
          sendQuest("@gre@Bandos Kills: @whi@"+bandosKills, 15895);
          sendQuest("@gre@Armadyl Kills: @whi@"+armaKills, 15897);
          sendQuest("@gre@Sardomin Kills: @whi@"+saraKills, 15898);
          sendQuest("@gre@Zamorak Kills: @whi@"+zammyKills, 15899);
          sendQuest("", 15900);
          sendQuest("", 15901);
          setInterfaceWalkable(15892);

}
[/code]
I have already defined Zamorak, Saradomin, Armadyl and Bandos kills in my server so thats not a problem

I have also specified which area is god wars like so

public boolean godwars() { if ((absX >= 2820 && absX <= 2880 && absY >= 3748 && absY <= 3772) //Main Area || (absX >= 2751 && absX <= 3814 && absY >= 3832 && absY <= 3875) //Commander || (absX >= 2833 && absX <= 2879 && absY >= 3782 && absY <= 3833) //Bird || (absX >= 2838 && absX <= 2862 && absY >= 3658 && absY <= 3694)) { //Bandos return true; } else { return false; } }
I think there is a conflict with the “public boolean nonWild” and “public boolean godwars”

Non wild has this interface shown

if(nonWild()) { outStream.createFrame(208); outStream.writeWordBigEndian_dup(197); sendQuest("@gre@safe", 199); }

and this for god wars

[code]if (godwars()) {
sendQuest("@whi@Godwars", 15894); //Title

          //Left hand side
          sendQuest("@gre@Bandos Kills: @whi@"+bandosKills, 15895);
          sendQuest("@gre@Armadyl Kills: @whi@"+armaKills, 15897);
          sendQuest("@gre@Sardomin Kills: @whi@"+saraKills, 15898);
          sendQuest("@gre@Zamorak Kills: @whi@"+zammyKills, 15899);
          sendQuest("", 15900);
          sendQuest("", 15901);
          setInterfaceWalkable(15892);

}[/code]
But when i go to the god wars area in game both the safe zone and god wars interfaces flicker on a off really fast

I have tried replacing both interfaces with this

[code]if(nonWild()) {
if (godwars()) {
sendQuest("@whi@Godwars", 15894); //Title

          //Left hand side
          sendQuest("@gre@Bandos Kills: @whi@"+bandosKills, 15895);
          sendQuest("@gre@Armadyl Kills: @whi@"+armaKills, 15897);
          sendQuest("@gre@Sardomin Kills: @whi@"+saraKills, 15898);
          sendQuest("@gre@Zamorak Kills: @whi@"+zammyKills, 15899);
          sendQuest("", 15900);
          sendQuest("", 15901);
          setInterfaceWalkable(15892);

} else if (!godwars()) {
outStream.createFrame(208);
outStream.writeWordBigEndian_dup(197);
sendQuest("@gre@safe", 199);
}
[/code]
but the nonwild interface shows in the god wars area
Can anyone help me?

Read full topic
item.source: Conflict with God wars Interface and nonwild interface Need help
